I always have a love for this game. Despite it's flaws in lower level matchmaking, specifically the dangers of Solo Queue in Silver, I am constantly amazed at both the community and structure of the game. It's recoil on guns like the AK-47, it's community servers, and it's amazing maps all have been a part of my life for many years, on multiple steam accounts. This is by far one of the greatest games I have ever played.
Play this, after you played the newest stuff.
